entry.title: Seven minutes in heaven
entry.summary:
Author: NightWrites_leaf

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 162,902Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 382

Summary: Dick Grayson decided that the Young Justice crew and the Titans needed a proper official meting, no missions, no explosions, just hanging out as a big group of friends… with some alcohol. They end up playing never have I ever and seven minutes in haven. Wally and Dick end up just a little too close in the closet and they now have to figure out what this thing between them is. The fic is filled with character dynamics, fluff, smut, crack, angst and heartbreak! - and it is currently ongoing BUT i post pretty regularly (at least one chapter a week).

entry.title: 𝑺𝑴𝑶𝑲𝑬 𝑺𝑰𝑮𝑵𝑨𝑳𝑺 // 𝑨 𝑺𝑼𝑷𝑬𝑹𝑩𝑨𝑻 𝑺𝑻𝑶𝑹𝒀
entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 123,374Chapters: 19/31Kudos: 255

Summary: Clark Kent has spent his life running into fire without hesitation - but nothing prepared him for the slow burn of seeing Bruce Wayne again. Now a respected firefighter in Smallville, Clark lives for service, silence, and the aching memory of the boy he once loved. Bruce Wayne returns to his childhood summer town broken and barely breathing, carrying more baggage than belongings and hiding scars he refuses to speak of. He didn’t plan to stay. He didn’t plan to see Clark again. And he certainly didn’t expect the heat between them to reignite into something he can’t ignore. Living in the same town for the summer brings shared coffee, sleepless nights, and the kind of intimacy that feels too dangerous to name. But some flames don’t die quietly - they wait for the right spark..

entry.title: The Meta Reform Act
entry.summary:
Author: Morrigan_Jinx

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,298Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 21

Summary: In this AU, meta humans are considered dangerous and second class citizens. All metas are imprisoned until the age of 18 when they can be sold for individual purchase. Selling underage metas is illegal but it happens. Bruce managed to save his childhood friend and long term crush from the enforcers. Together he and Clark and trying to fight the injustice along with Bruce’s adopted son Dick. It’s just a normal night of creating petitions in the study when Bruce gets a call from Roy Harper saying he’s found 3 underage, abused metas and he wants Bruce to come take them home.

entry.title: Despite everything, it’s still you
entry.summary:
Author: VettTrece

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,170Chapters: 12/17Kudos: 377

Summary: Bruce Wayne, lonely, distrustful, and worn down by a city that never changes, witnesses the impossible: a man flies in front of him, no wires, no tricks, no logical explanation. Superman has arrived. Not as the man from Bruce's world, but as a figure who shouldn’t have crossed the threshold. He hails from a different universe, one with different rules. A place where, according to his logic, Bruce is meant to be his soulmate. But in this Gotham, there is no destiny, there is no hope. In his home there's no room for myths. Until now. Or: Clark isn't in his own world: the one where soulmates are as natural as the warmth of the sun or the darkness of night. He doesn't know how he ended up here; perhaps fate, perhaps chance, but undeniably the Gotham's vigilante spoke the first words destiny had reserved for him. And yet, everything feels strange, like a distorted reflection of the reality he once knew. Bruce, unaware of the burden Clark carries, chooses to help him find a way back to his world, and along the way, to uncover more about his own reality. Léelo en Español aquí.

entry.title: The Contract
entry.summary:
Author: imanaddictiveiguess

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,549Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 63

Summary: Eons upon eons have passed since Hadrian "Harry Potter" Black became Death's master. Now expertly wielding powers that preside over both death and magic throughout all of existence and his world now long gone; Hadrian after mourning his friends and long lost world eventually took Death's offer and stayed by their side balancing the cosmos. Now millennia afterwards Death saw it fit to drop him in a new reality where super heroes and villains exist often facing world ending disasters like every other Tuesday. His new duty is that he must help keep this universe from imploding on itself all while on "vacation". No big deal…right?

entry.title: From Gotham with Love
entry.summary:
Author: anxiousdepressedintrovert

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,586Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 76

Summary: Martha and Thomas Wayne are Gotham’s golden couple—wealthy, admired, and untouchable. Their daughter, Beatrice, is the heart of their legacy. But one night shatters everything. The Waynes are murdered in cold blood, and young Beatrice vanishes without a trace. Two years later, she returns. Alive—but not the same. Now, Gotham must face the mystery of the girl who came back... and the shadows that followed her home. CURRENTLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION

entry.title: The Constant and the Shelter
entry.summary:
Author: brmqtr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,567Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: Lois Lane goes to Gotham chasing a story about urban resilience. What she finds instead is something smaller — and infinitely harder to define. Bruce Wayne, patching his own wounds at three in the morning. Clark Kent, apron on, making terrible coffee and refusing to leave. Between them: arguments about safety, burnt breakfast, unspoken affection, and a kind of love built on persistence rather than peace. As Lois watches the world’s finest save no one but each other, she writes the only story that matters: The Constant and the Shelter — a study of two men who learned that home isn’t a place, but the light you keep alive together.

entry.title: Real Man
entry.summary:
Author: merxurie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,093Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 430

Summary: Bruce Wayne has to do it all. He has to, because he chose this path. No one forced him to be Batman, to be the CEO that Wayne Enterprises needs, to adopt Dick Grayson and love him more everyday. No one forced him into this, really... except that he's suffocating. - In which Bruce wants to be everything to everyone, but he just cannot burden others with all of...him. And Clark Kent is a sucker for kind eyes and has a 'I can fix him' complex.

entry.title: baby bird
entry.summary:
Author: snapdragonsuplex

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,326Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 240

Summary: “Batman!”Dick freezes at the same time as Bruce. They both turn to face the elevator, where a man and a woman- the Drakes, he remembers- are standing alongside Lucius and Alfred. Mrs. Drake has a little kid, probably around two, in her arms.Said little kid is pointing right at Bruce.“Batman! Batman!”--------------------------Dick babysits Conner, and meets the world's biggest Batman fan.
